svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Total cropland area, measured in hectares. Cropland refers to the area defined by the UN Food and Agricultural
Organization (FAO) as 'arable land and permanent crops'.
